entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 30 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
